description:
Hitomi, the student council president who is famous for being strict about school rules, orders the suspension of Aniken`s activities!
The club members can`t stand being defeated by the student council president, who doesn`t require proof, so they show off the student council president`s perverted hobbies, and the otakus thoroughly train the high-handed cosplay maid student council president!
Source: hanime.tv

titles.title: Les passe-temps de la présidente des élèves
